name: Diablo II: Lord of Destruction
description:
RaPiMoDEBianPaKaGer
Acceso Directo a Diablo II: Lord of Destruction.

Descarga Oficial: https://www.blizzard.com/es-es/download

Requiere de un CD-Key original para jugar en battlenet.

Recuerda actualizar a la versiòn 1.14d para que 3Dfx funcione
notes:
Ejecutar el configurador de nGLide desde el menú contextual > Run EXE inside wine prefix.

/home/emmanuel/Games/battlenet/drive_c/windows/syswow64/nglide_config.exe

files.instalador: N/A:Please select the Diablo II Expansion Set setup file

content:
files:
- nglide:
    filename: nGlide_setup.exe
    url: http://www.zeus-software.com/downloads/nglide/d-1.html
- instalador: N/A:Please select the Diablo II Expansion Set setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -3dfx
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Diablo II/Game.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /S
    description: Installing nGlide...
    executable: nglide
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
